subject: Partnership Proposal — Annual Contract Discussion
snippet: Hi Darko, following our meeting last week, I'd like to formalize our partnership...

Hi Darko,

Following our meeting last week, I'd like to formalize our partnership discussion. We're interested in an annual contract for your consulting services. Could we schedule a call this Friday to discuss terms?

Attached is our proposed scope of work.

Best regards,
Hans Mueller
CTO, TechVision GmbH

reply_draft:

Thank you for the proposal — I'm very interested in formalizing our partnership. Friday works well for me. How about 2:00 PM CET?

I'll review the scope of work beforehand.

Best,
Darko

Dr. Sarah Hoffmann

subject: Dashboard bug report — charts not loading
snippet: Hi Darko, we noticed the real-time charts on the IoT dashboard aren't loading...
body_preview:
Hi Darko,

We noticed the real-time charts on the IoT dashboard aren't loading since the last deployment. The data API seems fine but the frontend shows a blank white area.

Can you take a look? This is affecting our demo to investors tomorrow.

Urgent — please respond ASAP.

Frank Hartmann
ai_summary: URGENT: SmartHome reports IoT dashboard charts not loading after last deployment. Investor demo tomorrow. Needs immediate attention.
reply_draft:
Hi Frank,

I'll look into this right away. It sounds like it could be a frontend rendering issue with the latest Recharts update. I'll have a fix deployed within the next 2 hours.

Best,
Darko

Darko
